abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Moves used by a Pokémon with Infiltrator will ignore enemy effects such as Light Screen and Reflect unless said effects are also applied to this particular Pokémon. It does not ignore moves that lower attacking power like Spiked Shell, the critical hit rate reducing effects of Tail Badger- battle order altogether, regulates its spread, but doesn’t change battle result, battle changes, and each adds one to status inaccuracies.
